physical_appearance: "The image depicts an electronic device for gaming and entertainment purposes, as well as a gaming cartridge. There are two controllers with black buttons which are joined by wires. However, they are not connected to the gaming console. There is a slot on the top of the gaming console that is the same length and width of the gaming cartridge. The gaming cartridge has the word, ""Tennis""
